title: CelebA Face Attributes Classification
description: Large-scale face attributes dataset with 40 binary attributes (Liu et al., ICCV 2015). Annotate celebrity face images with attributes including hair color, age, gender, and facial features.
citation:

    pages = "3730--3738",
